attributes.review: I got the app for updates about trump but I keep getting glitches this is the worst app ever

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: This app ate the best breakfast in town but it is not really good. Hey I’m done with your babe and I’m not sure if you wanna meet me at the end of the day.

attributes.title: HATE THIS APP
